items.subject: Re: Exclusive Dining Experience Invitation

body.text:
Hello, thanks for reaching out. Sorry for the late reply! I would love to
collaborate! I’m a flight attendant so I could fly out to any of the
locations you would prefer, I was curious if you’d be able to provide a 1
night hotel in whichever city you’d prefer me to visit?

*TikTok* <https://www.tiktok.com/@rainclements?_t=8ajkuifiq8a&_r=1>
*Instagram* <https://www.instagram.com/rain_clements/?hl=en>

body.html:
Hello, thanks for reaching out. Sorry for the late reply! I would love to collaborate! I’m a flight attendant so I could fly out to any of the locations you would prefer, I was curious if you’d be able to provide a 1 night hotel in whichever city you’d prefer me to visit?

TikTok
Instagram


On Wed, May 14, 2025 at 7:32 AM Adrian ChubbyGroup <adrian@collabs.chubbygroup.com> wrote:
Hi rainclements,

I wanted to follow up on my previous invitation for a complimentary dining experience at Chubby Group. We'd love to host you and a guest at one of our restaurants to showcase our premium Japanese Wagyu offerings:

California:
Los Angeles: Chubby Cattle Little Tokyo
Pleasanton: Chubby Cattle
Beverly Hills: Chubby Curry
Covina: Chubby Curry
Cerritos: Mikiya Wagyu Shabu House
Monterey Park: Chubby Cattle
Rowland Heights: Mikiya Wagyu Shabu House
Rowland Heights: Chubby Cattle
Rowland Heights: Chubby Skewers
 
Other Cities:
New York City: Chubby Skewers
Chicago: Chubby Cattle
Chicago: Wagyu House by The X Pot
Las Vegas: Chubby Cattle
Philadelphia: Chubby Cattle
Atlanta: Wagyu House Atlanta
Duluth, GA: Chubby Cattle BBQ Duluth


Please reply with Your preferred location and I'll check with the restaurant's collaboration reservation availability for you.

Looking forward to your response.
Best regards,
Adrian  
Marketing Manager  
Chubby Group

On Tue, Apr 22, 2025 at 2:30 PM Cecilla ChubbyGroup <cecilla@collabs.chubbygroup.com> wrote:

Dear Andrea & Lewis,
Thank you for your interest in NIKU X — we are excited to have you! I am confirming your reservation with our manager now, and you’ll get a final confirmation email shortly.
Your visit includes a complimentary dining experience for you and a guest, and we'd love if you shared your authentic experience with your Instagram and TikTok audiences, highlighting:


"Location:
21 W 35th St New York, NY 10001 United States

First of Its Kind: They’re the only restaurant in the U.S. offering a fresh (never-frozen) A5 Wagyu steak buffet—an unlimited, premium experience hard to find anywhere else.

Wide Selection: More than 50 dishes are available, including king crab, lobster, premium seafood, and Japanese sushi. It’s a combination of AYCE (All You Can Eat) variety with high-end ingredients.

High-End & Contemporary: the interior features ultra-modern Robatayaki grills, tile mosaics, and an open-kitchen concept.

Elevated Buffet Experience: NIKU X merges luxury dining with the indulgence of an unlimited buffet, creating a “culinary journey” that emphasizes craft and quality.

Convenient Hours: Open for dinner every day (with later hours on weekends) and weekend lunch service—a flexible schedule for those looking to enjoy fresh A5 Wagyu and premium seafood at any time.


[Instagram]
Tag people: @nikuxnyc

Add location: NIKU X NYC


[Tiktok]

@ Mention: @nikuxla

Location: Midtown South (New York, United States)

Point of Contact:
ophelia: 2125108212"


Feel free to follow the guidelines, but don’t hesitate to add your own flair — we want it to match your style. You can find more details and upload your content here:

On May 15, 2025 at 2:53 AM CDT april@collabs.chubbygroup.com wrote:

Yes. he's free to make the content as he sees fit. I can provide some talking points but they're not required:
Location: 2162 S Archer Ave, Chicago, IL 60616

1. Premium Ingredients: Imported purebred A5 Wagyu beef flown in from Japan.

2. All-You-Can-Eat Wagyu: Offers three premium tiers ranging from $55 to $85, featuring American, Australian, and Japanese A5 Wagyu.

3. Diverse Menu: Includes not only Wagyu but also curated seafood (shrimp, scallops) and unlimited sushi (like Salmon Nigiri and Wagyu Nigiri).
Signature Hot Dishes: Features unique items like Wagyu Tartare, Sukiyaki Hot Pot, and A5 Wagyu Stone Pot Bibimbap.
Desserts and Snacks: Serves desserts like milk tea, ice cream, and Asian snacks. 

4. Chubby Club Membership (Clear CTA encouraging sign-ups for Chubby Club Membership)
Membership Benefits Across 35+ Locations,
Save up to $20 per visit at any Chubby Group restaurant and VIP perks 
5. Affordable Luxury: Serves premium wagyu at a lower cost due to bulk purchasing and in-house partnerships.

6. Interactive Dining: Automated ordering system and tableside service for quick delivery. 

#Hashtages: #ChicagoFoodie #ChinatownEats #SushiLoversChicago #AllYouCanEatChicago

On Tue, Apr 22, 2025 at 12:47 PM Morgan ChubbyGroup <morgan@collabs.chubbygroup.com> wrote:
Hi, the Pleasanton, Chubby Cattle location is opening in mid May. Can I put down a time for you at May 22 12PM at noon?
Let us know if you're interested in moving forward:
 a) Preferred Location : leasanton, Chubby Cattle
 b) Date and time for the visit： May 22 12PM
 c) Full name for reservation
 d) A contact phone number
 e) Any dietary restrictions


On Tuesday, Apr 22, 2025 at 10:36 am morgan@collabs.chubbygroup.com wrote:

Hi herald hernandez,
Thank you so much for your interest in details about Chubby Group — we're thrilled about the potential of working together!
We’re currently offering a complimentary fine dining experience for you and a guest (valued between $120–$180) in exchange for your authentic content on Instagram and/or TikTok. During your visit, we’d love for you to highlight:
The flavor, texture, and superior quality of our purebred A5 Wagyu beef and imported seafood, flown in daily from Japan
The presentation and consistency of our culinary creations
The overall ambiance and level of service we provide
While we’re not offering additional monetary compensation for this collaboration, we’re confident this experience will provide plenty of premium content that aligns with your audience and creative style.
Feel free check out the details and upload your video directly to our platform here: https://influencers.creatorain.com/auth/creator-signup/chubby-group
Let us know if you'd like to move forward, and I’d be happy to coordinate next steps — including checking reservation availability.
Best,
Morgan ChubbyGroup
Chubby Group

Hi Ray,

Thanks so much for setting up the reservation and everything!

I was chatting with Shanny, and since this isn’t a paid collaboration, there are a few talking points we’re not comfortable moving forward with—we usually reserve those for sponsored partnerships.

She’s more than happy to attend the dinner and share her experience, but would prefer to stick to her usual content style, similar to the video you shared. This type of video feels more natural and tends to perform better with her audience than content that comes across as an ad.

She’s happy to mention the restaurant name and the dishes she tried, but would prefer to avoid any language that feels overly promotional.

If that works for you, let us know and we’ll go ahead and confirm the dinner. You can include 310-382-0681 as the number on the reservation.

Best,
Thiza

items.subject: Re: Exclusive Dining Experience Invitation

body.text:
Hi Phillip,


   Thank you for contacting MWIMPP. 


   I see that you are trying to reach Athieno. I can assist you with your inquiry. 


   Athieno is located in Uganda. She's on the continent of Africa. Therefore none of these locations would be feasible for her at this time. The founder of the company does live on the east coast in the United States. If you really wanted a collaboration with the company, the founder or our Ambassador Israel is located in the US.


   If you specifically wanted a collaboration with Athieno that would not be possible at this time, unless this venture includes airfare and lodging. However when she comes to the states she could circle back to you.


   I hope this information has been helpful. Should you need anything further, feel free to respond here. Thank you.




Alexis H.
Donations Management

"It only takes $19 USD to feed a family for 3 days"

http://www.mwimpp.org

Hi Phillip,

Thank you for your follow-up and the invitation for a complimentary dining experience at Chubby Group. We have reviewed the list of your restaurants and are interested in the opportunity to sample your premium Japanese Wagyu offerings.

Among the locations you mentioned, NIKU X in New York City would be our preferred choice.

For our availability, we would like to dine in on May 11th, May 16th, or May 17th.

Please let us know what day works best for your team, and we look forward to experiencing dining at NIKU X.

Best regards,

 d) A contact phone number

On Tuesday, Apr 22, 2025 at 10:36 am morgan@collabs.chubbygroup.com wrote:

Hi herald hernandez,
Thank you so much for your interest in details about Chubby Group — we're thrilled about the potential of working together!
We’re currently offering a complimentary fine dining experience for you and a guest (valued between $120–$180) in exchange for your authentic content on Instagram and/or TikTok. During your visit, we’d love for you to highlight:
The flavor, texture, and superior quality of our purebred A5 Wagyu beef and imported seafood, flown in daily from Japan
The presentation and consistency of our culinary creations
The overall ambiance and level of service we provide
While we’re not offering additional monetary compensation for this collaboration, we’re confident this experience will provide plenty of premium content that aligns with your audience and creative style.
Feel free check out the details and upload your video directly to our platform here: https://influencers.creatorain.com/auth/creator-signup/chubby-group
Let us know if you'd like to move forward, and I’d be happy to coordinate next steps — including checking reservation availability.
Best,
Morgan ChubbyGroup
Chubby Group

On Wed, Apr 23, 2025 at 4:34 PM Amir Hangry <amirhangry@gmail.com> wrote:

On Thu, Apr 24, 2025 at 7:31 AM Tammy ChubbyGroup <tammy@collabs.chubbygroup.com> wrote:

On Wednesday, Apr 23, 2025 at 4:44 pm amirhangry@gmail.com wrote:
Awesome! Since ill be posting on tiktok as well would it possible if i can bring 2 guest with me? Total of 3? Also i can post on my facebook. ☺️

On Thu, Apr 24, 2025 at 5:41 AM Tammy ChubbyGroup <tammy@collabs.chubbygroup.com> wrote:

Dear Amir Hangry,
Thank you for your interest in The X Pot Las Vegas — we are excited to have you! I am confirming your reservation with our manager now, and you’ll get a final confirmation email shortly.
Your visit includes a complimentary dining experience for you and a guest, and we'd love if you shared your authentic experience with your Instagram and TikTok audiences, highlighting:


"Location: Grand Canal Shoppes At The Palazzo, Fl 2 3327 S Las Vegas Blvd, Suite 2884 Las Vegas

Premium Ingredients: A5 Wagyu, hot pot broth crafted from pure spring water and premium ingredients.

Affordable Luxury: We serve premium Wagyu, sourced from the finest supply chain for unparalleled quality.

Futuristic Dining Experience: 360-degree HD projections and interactive light shows.

Interactive Dining: Diners cook their own ingredients tableside andcan enjoy exclusive live performances, such as the face-changing ceremony and noodle dance, with select dishes.


High-End Fusion Cuisine: Features unique dishes like Wagyu Tartarte and King Crab Cake, blending Asian and Western culinary traditions.

Exclusive Meat Offerings: Certified Kobe beef and expertly aged Wagyu.

Luxury Atmosphere: Offers a unique blend of fine dining and entertainment, creating a multi-sensory culinary experience.

Signature Dishes: The Chef's Tasting Menu offers an exquisite selection, including Wagyu Tartare, Bone Marrow Bibimbap, Golden Wagyu Rice with Truffle, and more, accompanied by a rich broth and an extensive array of premium ingredients for cooking.

Interactive Dining: Guests pick ingredients and cook them in hot pots at the table, automated ordering system and tableside service for quick delivery.

#Hashtages: #LasVegasEats #LasVegas #HotPot #Wagyu #Luxury #FineDinning #VenetianResort #Palazzo

[Instagram]

Tag people (invite collaborators): @xpotlv @chubby.group

Add location: The X Pot

[Tiktok]

@ Mention: @thexpot @chubby.group

Location: The X Pot (3327 LasVegas Blvd S, Clark, Nevada 89109, USA)

Point of Contact:
Cecilia: 8668889768"


Feel free to follow the guidelines, but don’t hesitate to add your own flair — we want it to match your style. You can find more details and upload your content here:
https://influencers.creatorain.com/auth/creator-signup/chubby-group

In the meantime, could you please share:
a) Full name for reservation
b) A contact phone number
c) Any dietary restrictions

Best,
Tammy

On Tue, May 6, 2025 at 8:28 AM Thiza Brustolin <thiza@juggernautmp.com> wrote:
Hi Ray,

Thanks so much for setting up the reservation and everything!

I was chatting with Shanny, and since this isn’t a paid collaboration, there are a few talking points we’re not comfortable moving forward with—we usually reserve those for sponsored partnerships.

She’s more than happy to attend the dinner and share her experience, but would prefer to stick to her usual content style, similar to the video you shared. This type of video feels more natural and tends to perform better with her audience than content that comes across as an ad.

She’s happy to mention the restaurant name and the dishes she tried, but would prefer to avoid any language that feels overly promotional.

If that works for you, let us know and we’ll go ahead and confirm the dinner. You can include 310-382-0681 as the number on the reservation.

Best,
Thiza

body.text:
Hi Phillip,

Thank you for your interest in working with Dora––our team manages her
brand partnerships, and we'd be glad to help assist here.


While we'd love to partner with you in the future, I'm afraid we're unable
to accommodate trade-based programs. If the team is interested in gifting a
dining experience for her to try out (without post obligations), please let
me know and I'll see if she's planning to be in any of these cities.


Alternatively, if budget becomes available in the future, we'd be glad to
share her rate sheet for reference to highlight your restaurants.


We hope to hear from you either way.


Warm regards,

Robert

Hi Phillip,

Thank you for your interest in working with Dora––our team manages her brand partnerships, and we'd be glad to help assist here.


While we'd love to partner with you in the future, I'm afraid we're unable to accommodate trade-based programs. If the team is interested in gifting a dining experience for her to try out (without post obligations), please let me know and I'll see if she's planning to be in any of these cities.


Alternatively, if budget becomes available in the future, we'd be glad to share her rate sheet for reference to highlight your restaurants.


We hope to hear from you either way.


Warm regards,

Robert

Hey April, do you think we would be able to come in today? 

On Thu, Apr 24, 2025 at 12:48 PM April ChubbyGroup <april@collabs.chubbygroup.com> wrote:
Hi sorry we don't have the budget for commission for now. But feel free to make a reservation and dine with us at any time though!

On Thursday, Apr 24, 2025 at 12:45 pm nikkiean214@gmail.com wrote:
In the previous email I stated that we have a fee for all collaborations. 
Will this be something we could potentially discuss? 

On Thu, Apr 24, 2025 at 12:05 PM April ChubbyGroup <april@collabs.chubbygroup.com> wrote:

Dear Nikki Ean,
Thank you for your interest in Chubby Cattle Chicago — we are excited to have you! I am confirming your reservation with our manager now, and you’ll get a final confirmation email shortly.
Your visit includes a complimentary dining experience for you and a guest, and we'd love if you shared your authentic experience with yourInstagram and TikTok audiences, highlighting:



"Location: 2162 S Archer Ave, Chicago, IL 60616

Required:
1. Premium Ingredients: Imported purebred A5 Wagyu beef flown in from Japan.

2. All-You-Can-Eat Wagyu: Offers three premium tiers ranging from $55 to $85, featuring American, Australian, and Japanese A5 Wagyu.

3. Diverse Menu: Includes not only Wagyu but also curated seafood (shrimp, scallops) and unlimited sushi (like Salmon Nigiri and Wagyu Nigiri).
Signature Hot Dishes: Features unique items like Wagyu Tartare, Sukiyaki Hot Pot, and A5 Wagyu Stone Pot Bibimbap.
Desserts and Snacks: Serves desserts like milk tea, ice cream, and Asian snacks.

4. Chubby Club Membership (Clear CTA encouraging sign-ups for Chubby Club Membership)
Membership Benefits Across 35+ Locations,
Save up to $20 per visit at any Chubby Group restaurant and VIP perks

Optional Talking Points:
5. Affordable Luxury: Serves premium wagyu at a lower cost due to bulk purchasing and in-house partnerships.

6. Interactive Dining: Automated ordering system and tableside service for quick delivery.

#Hashtages: #ChicagoFoodie #ChinatownEats #SushiLoversChicago #AllYouCanEatChicago

[Instagram]

Tag people (invite collaborators): @chubbycattlechicago @chubby.group

Add location: Chubby Cattle Chicago

[Tiktok]

@ Mention: @chubbycattlebbq

Location: Chubby Cattle BBQ | Chicago

Point of Contact:
Cecilia: 7734519398"


Feel free to follow the guidelines, but don’t hesitate to add your own flair — we want it to match your style. You can find more details and upload your content here:
https://influencers.creatorain.com/auth/creator-signup/chubby-group

In the meantime, could you please share:
a) Full name for reservation
b) A contact phone number
c) Any dietary restrictions

Best,
April

First of Its Kind: They’re the only restaurant in the U.S. offering a fresh (never-frozen) A5 Wagyu steak buffet—an unlimited, premium experience hard to find anywhere else.
Wide Selection: More than 50 dishes are available, including king crab, lobster, premium seafood, and Japanese sushi. It’s a combination of AYCE (All You Can Eat) variety with high-end ingredients.
High-End & Contemporary: Located in The Wilshire Grand Center (Suite 212, the tallest building in Los Angeles), the interior features ultra-modern Robatayaki grills, tile mosaics, and an open-kitchen concept.
Elevated Buffet Experience: Inspired by its sister brand, The XPot, NIKU X merges luxury dining with the indulgence of an unlimited buffet, creating a “culinary journey” that emphasizes craft and quality.
Convenient Hours: Open for dinner every day (with later hours on weekends) and weekend lunch service—a flexible schedule for those looking to enjoy fresh A5 Wagyu and premium seafood at any time.[Instagram]

We’re currently offering a complimentary fine dining experience for you and a guest (valued between $120–$180) in exchange foryour authentic content on Instagram and/or TikTok. During your visit, we’d love for you to highlight:
The flavor, texture, and superior quality of our purebred A5 Wagyu beef and imported seafood, flown in daily from Japan
The presentation and consistency of our culinary creations
The overall ambiance and level of service we provide
While we’re not offering additional monetary compensation for this collaboration, we’re confident this experience will provide plenty of premium content that aligns with your audience and creative style.
Let us know if you're interested in moving forward:
a) Preferred Location
b) Date and time for the visit (Preferably a weekday or Friday/Sunday noon)
c) Full name for reservation
d) A contact phone number
e) Any dietary restrictions
Feel free check out the details and upload your video directly to our platform here: https://influencers.creatorain.com/auth/creator-signup/chubby-group
Best,
Blair
Chubby Group

"Location:
21 W 35th St New York, NY 10001 United States

First of Its Kind: They’re the only restaurant in the U.S. offering a fresh (never-frozen) A5 Wagyu steak buffet—an unlimited, premium experience hard to find anywhere else.

Wide Selection: More than 50 dishes are available, including king crab, lobster, premium seafood, and Japanese sushi. It’s a combination of AYCE (All You Can Eat) variety with high-end ingredients.

High-End & Contemporary: the interior features ultra-modern Robatayaki grills, tile mosaics, and an open-kitchen concept.

Elevated Buffet Experience: NIKU X merges luxury dining with the indulgence of an unlimited buffet, creating a “culinary journey” that emphasizes craft and quality.

Convenient Hours: Open for dinner every day (with later hours on weekends) and weekend lunch service—a flexible schedule for those looking to enjoy fresh A5 Wagyu and premium seafood at any time.

body.text:
Hi Blair,

Apologies for the delay, I am confirming the below with Jen on dietary restrictions. In the meantime I have some questions regarding the copy for Instagram/TikTok – does this exact format need to be followed or can it be loose and more authentic to her experience? Also, confirming this is for stories only which is usually what Jen does for opportunities like these. She is also not very active on Instagram, TikTok is her standard platform. Let me know if its ok to just pursue TikTok for this.

Thanks,
Becca

From: Blair ChubbyGroup <blair@collabs.chubbygroup.com>
Sent: Saturday, April 26, 2025 10:30 AM
To: Becca Lonngren <blonngren@circlemp.com>
Subject: Re: Exclusive Invitation: Premium Dining Experience with Chubby Group for thejenglv

Hi Becca,

I wanted to follow up on my previous invitation for a complimentary dining experience at Chubby Group. We'd love to host you and a guest at The X Pot Las Vegas to showcase our premium Japanese Wagyu offerings.

If you're interested, it would be great if you could share the following:
a) Full name for reservation
b) A contact phone number
c) Any dietary restrictions

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards,
Blair
Marketing Manager
Chubby Group


On Monday, Apr 21, 2025 at 1:00 pm blair@collabs.chubbygroup.com<mailto:blair@collabs.chubbygroup.com> wrote:

Dear Becca Lonngren,
Thank you for your interest in The X Pot Las Vegas — we are excited to have you! I am confirming your reservation with our manager now, and you’ll get a final confirmation email shortly.
Your visit includes a complimentary dining experience for you and a guest, and we'd love if you shared your authentic experience with your Instagram and TikTok audiences, highlighting:


"Location: Grand Canal Shoppes At The Palazzo, Fl 2 3327 S Las Vegas Blvd, Suite 2884 Las Vegas

Premium Ingredients: A5 Wagyu, hot pot broth crafted from pure spring water and premium ingredients.

Affordable Luxury: We serve premium Wagyu, sourced from the finest supply chain for unparalleled quality.

Futuristic Dining Experience: 360-degree HD projections and interactive light shows.

Interactive Dining: Diners cook their own ingredients tableside and can enjoy exclusive live performances, such as the face-changing ceremony and noodle dance, with select dishes.

High-End Fusion Cuisine: Features unique dishes like Wagyu Tartarte and King Crab Cake, blending Asian and Western culinary traditions.

Exclusive Meat Offerings: Certified Kobe beef and expertly aged Wagyu.

Luxury Atmosphere: Offers a unique blend of fine dining and entertainment, creating a multi-sensory culinary experience.

Signature Dishes: The Chef's Tasting Menu offers an exquisite selection, including Wagyu Tartare, Bone Marrow Bibimbap, Golden Wagyu Rice with Truffle, and more, accompanied by a rich broth and an extensive array of premium ingredients for cooking.

Interactive Dining: Guests pick ingredients and cook them in hot pots at the table, automated ordering system and tableside service for quick delivery.

Dear Jeremy Kim,
Thank you for your interest in NIKU X — we are excited to have you! I am confirming your reservation with our manager now, and you’ll get a final confirmation email shortly.
Your visit includes a complimentary dining experience for you and a guest, and we'd love if you shared your authentic experience with your Instagram and TikTok audiences, highlighting:


"Location:
21 W 35th St New York, NY 10001 United States

First of Its Kind: They’re the only restaurant in the U.S. offering a fresh (never-frozen) A5 Wagyu steak buffet—an unlimited, premium experience hard to find anywhere else.

Wide Selection: More than 50 dishes are available, including king crab, lobster, premium seafood, and Japanese sushi. It’s a combination of AYCE (All You Can Eat) variety with high-end ingredients.

High-End & Contemporary: the interior features ultra-modern Robatayaki grills, tile mosaics, and an open-kitchen concept.

Elevated Buffet Experience: NIKU X merges luxury dining with the indulgence of an unlimited buffet, creating a “culinary journey” that emphasizes craft and quality.

Convenient Hours: Open for dinner every day (with later hours on weekends) and weekend lunch service—a flexible schedule for those looking to enjoy fresh A5 Wagyu and premium seafood at any time.


[Instagram]
Tag people: @nikuxnyc

Add location: NIKU X NYC


[Tiktok]

@ Mention: @nikuxla

Location: Midtown South (New York, United States)

Point of Contact:
ophelia: 2125108212"


Feel free to follow the guidelines, but don’t hesitate to add your own flair — we want it to match your style. You can find more details and upload your content here:
https://influencers.creatorain.com/auth/creator-signup/chubby-group

In the meantime, could you please share:
a) Full name for reservation
b) A contact phone number
c) Any dietary restrictions

Best,
Ophelia ChubbyGroup

On Thu, Apr 24, 2025 at 12:24 PM Blair ChubbyGroup <blair@collabs.chubbygroup.com> wrote:

Dear Jacqueline,
Thank you for your interest in NIKU X — we are excited to have you!​ I am confirming your reservation with our manager now, and you’ll get a final confirmation email shortly.
Your visit includes a complimentary dining experience for you and a guest, and we'd love if you shared your authentic experience with your Instagram and TikTok audiences, highlighting:


"Location:
21 W 35th St New York, NY 10001 United States

First of Its Kind: They’re the only restaurant in the U.S. offering a fresh (never-frozen) A5 Wagyu steak buffet—an unlimited, premium experience hard to find anywhere else.

Wide Selection: More than 50 dishes are available, including king crab, lobster, premium seafood, and Japanese sushi. It’s a combination of AYCE (All You Can Eat) variety with high-end ingredients.

High-End & Contemporary: the interior features ultra-modern Robatayaki grills, tile mosaics, and an open-kitchen concept.

Elevated Buffet Experience: NIKU X merges luxury dining with the indulgence of an unlimited buffet, creating a “culinary journey” that emphasizes craft and quality.

Convenient Hours: Open for dinner every day (with later hours on weekends) and weekend lunch service—a flexible schedule for those looking to enjoy fresh A5 Wagyu and premium seafood at any time.


[Instagram]
Tag people: @nikuxnyc

Add location: NIKU X NYC


[Tiktok]

@ Mention: @nikuxla

Location: Midtown South (New York, United States)

Point of Contact:
ophelia: 2125108212"


Feel free to follow the guidelines, but don’t hesitate to add your own flair — we want it to match your style. You can find more details and upload your content here:
https://influencers.creatorain.com/auth/creator-signup/chubby-group

In the meantime, could you please share:
a) Full name for reservation
b) A contact phone number
c) Any dietary restrictions

Best,
Blair
